documents.title: Green Finance Policy Document 1
documents.content: This document outlines measures to support green projects and industries.

origin_prompt.content: 调用工具 GreenFinancePolicy.analyze_support_measures, 它的参数输入包含一个文档, 'title'是'Green Finance Policy Document 1', 'date'是'2023-01-15', 'content'是'This document outlines measures to support green projects and industries.'.
